name: Heart Attack (itch) (12-studio)
description:
In the game you will have to defeat different enemies in three levels before killing the main virus: stomach, liver and heart. Waves of infections will chase you and you will have to resist until the timer ends.

The project was realized for the Virtual Reality course inside the Politecnico di Torino by Group 12, formed by the following members:

Raffaele Palmieri (243256)
Emmanuel Cristophe (261822)
Dario Miaja (202298)
Elena Magi (262262)


The following assets were used:

2D Pixel Item Asset Pack -> https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/2d-pixel-item-asset-pack-9964...

Stone Monster -> https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/stone-monster-101433

Campfire Pack -> https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/fantasy/campfire-pack-1125...

Free Animated Space Man -> https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/free-animated-spac...

Level 1 Monsters Pack -> https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/creatures/level-1-monster-pa...

Character Monster 1 -> https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/creatures/character-monster-...

Free Food Pack -> https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/food/free-food-pack-85884

Alien Insect Character -> https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/creatures/alien-insect-chara...

Toony Colors Free -> https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/shaders/toony-colors-free-3926

Survival Tools -> https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/tools/survival-game-tools-139872

Music (Lame 8-bit) -> https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/lame-8-bit/
